testcase.classname: As an administrator (admin), I want to be able to update the packaging information with the specified id number via API connection.
testcase.name: admin PACKAGING When sending a PATCH request to the api/packaging/edit/{id} endpoint with valid
testcase.system-out: * The api user sets "api/packaging/edit" path parameters....................passed * The api user prepares a PATCH request containing "Gift Box with flower" and "75.00" information to send to the api packagingedit endpoint..passed * The api user sends a "PATCH" request and saves the returned response......passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 200.........................passed * The api user verifies that the "message" information in the response body is "Updated"..passed * The api user verifies that the "data" "id" information in the returned response body is the same as the id path parameter written in the endpoint..passed * The api user verifies that the "name" is "Gift Box with flower" by sending a GET request to the "api" "packaging" endpoint with the "data" "id" returned in the response body..passed
